com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.edrs

Interface IExternalDataItemRetriever


  • public interface IExternalDataItemRetriever
    A mechanism that provides direct access to data in an external data source that is identified through specified provenance information.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExternalDataContextResults getContext(Collection<ProvenanceGroup> provenanceGroups, int maxNumberOfItems, boolean shouldThrowIfTooManyItems)
      Gets an ExternalDataContextResults that contains a Source that contains platform-compatible XML.
      Source getLatestItems(Collection<ProvenanceGroup> provenanceGroups)
      Gets a Source containing platform-compatible XML that describes items that are associated with the specified ProvenanceGroups.

    • Method Detail

      • getLatestItems

        Source getLatestItems(Collection<ProvenanceGroup> provenanceGroups)
        Gets a Source containing platform-compatible XML that describes items that are associated with the specified ProvenanceGroups.
        Parameters:
        provenanceGroups - ProvenanceGroups that contain CardProvenances that identify the relevant information in the external data source.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • getContext

        ExternalDataContextResults getContext(Collection<ProvenanceGroup> provenanceGroups,
                                    int maxNumberOfItems,
                                    boolean shouldThrowIfTooManyItems)
        Gets an ExternalDataContextResults that contains a Source that contains platform-compatible XML. The items in this Source are indirectly associated with the specified ProvenanceGroups.
        Parameters:
        provenanceGroups - ProvenanceGroups that contain CardProvenances that identify the relevant information in the external data source.
        maxNumberOfItems - The maximum number of items that the XML in the Source in the ExternalDataContextResults can contain.
        shouldThrowIfTooManyItems - true to throw an exception (and return no results) when the number of items described in the ExternalDataContextResults would exceed maxNumberOfItems; false to throw no exception and return up to maxNumberOfItems results. If maxNumberOfItems is not exceeded, this parameter has no effect.
        Returns:
        See above.
